comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Printing this tip to show I've taken it to heart
What about when I say I’ll put the garbage out on time!

Take their word, and then reply with an email... "as you've instructed today, we will proceed with x"

Then they can't come back and pretend they didn't say what they said
No deal in business is real until it's in black and white
I asked, "how are you?" and I expect your reply in memo format on my desk in 15, Jim!
I asked my wife to rate my performance during our most recent encounter of sexual congress. She refused to put any of her comments in writing.
